content.confirm_content: Are you sure you want to enable authentication? If you forget or lose the password, the Brick has to be reset to factory defaults. See manual for details.

content.debug_report_desc_muted: complete report of all status information of this Brick except passwords

content.factory_reset_modal_text: A factory reset will reset all configuration to their default values. This action cannot be undone! The Brick will re-open the WiFi access point with the default SSID and passphrase from the label on the backside of the Brick. Are you sure?

script.wrong_firmware_type: Firmware file does not match the type of this Brick

content.enable_mdns_desc: Allows other devices in this network to find the Brick.

content.enable_mqtt_desc: This allows controlling the Brick over the configured MQTT broker. MQTT API documentation

content.ap_hide_ssid_desc_pre: The Brick is reachable under the BSSID
content.confirm_content: Are you sure you want to disable the WiFi Access Point? If no connection to a configured network can be established in the future, it is not possible to access the brick anymore.The brick then has to be reset to factory defaults. See manual for details.
